TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerDataConnection extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示設計工具中的資料存放區連接。

span.span: Represents a connection to a data store in a design tool.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件都代表在設計工具中的資料存放區的連接。The object represents a connection to a data store in the design tool. 通常會傳回物件的一部分屬性，並藉由讀取應用程式的組態檔，或藉由呼叫建立方法。Typically a object is returned as part of the property, and is created either by reading the application's configuration file or by calling the method.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立不會從應用程式的組態檔建立的物件。Use this constructor to create objects that are not created from the application's configuration file. 當您使用這個建構函式，屬性設定為`false`。When you use this constructor, the property is set to `false`.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱、資料提供者和連接字串，並指出連接是否從組態檔載入，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, data provider, and connection string, and indicates whether the connection was loaded from a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您需要指定的值時，請使用這個建構函式屬性，例如當您建立應用程式的組態檔中所儲存資訊的物件。Use this constructor when you need to specify the value of the property, such as when you are creating a object from information stored in the application's configuration file. 屬性設定的值為`isConfigured`參數。The property is set to the value of the `isConfigured` parameter.

summary.span: 取得連接已定義的應用程式連接字串。

span.span: Gets the application connection string defined for the connection.

value.span: 連接已定義的應用程式連接字串。

span.span: The application connection string defined for the connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含應用程式用來連接到資料存放區的連接字串。The property contains the connection string used by the application for connecting to the data store. 您必須使用方法來傳回連接字串適用於在設計環境中。You must use the method to return a connection string suitable for use in the design environment.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，指出連接資訊是否在應用程式組態檔中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the connection information is in the application's configuration file.

value.span: 如果連接定義於應用程式組態檔中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the connection is defined in the application's configuration file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會是`true`如果物件已從應用程式的組態檔讀取，或如果物件被寫入的應用程式的組態檔方法。The property will be `true` if the object was read from the application's configuration file, or if the object was written to the application's configuration file by the method. 當是`true`，則屬性設定為連接的名稱中所定義[connectionStrings 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)組態檔。When the is `true`, the property is set to the name of the connection as defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) of the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Name { get; }
.property instance string Name
Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Name : string

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the name of the data connection.
The name of the data connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含識別應用程式組態檔或資料連接的清單中的特定連線的名稱。The property contains the name that identifies a specific connection in an application configuration file or a list of data connections. 當屬性是`true`，屬性做`name`屬性中[connectionStrings 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)組態項目，或從傳回方法。When the property is `true`, property is used as the `name` attribute in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element, or is returned from the method.
